name: Compressed SYS File
summary: Learn about .SY_ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: SY_ files also may just be renamed SYS files and therefore may not be compressed.

description: A SY_ file is a compressed .sys file that is used by software installers to reduce the size of the installation files packaged inside the installer. This reduces the overall size of the installer. SY_ files can be expanded using the Microsoft Expand command line utility that expands one or more compressed files.

Compressed .SYS file sometimes used by application installers to reduce the size of installation files; similar to a .EX_ or .DL_ file and can be expanded back to a SYS file using the Microsoft Expand command line utility with the following syntax:
